listings.description: Nestled in the tranquil village of Sânpetru near Brașov, this charming cabin offers a perfect mix of rustic charm and modern convenience. Featuring an outdoor hot tub with mountain views, a cozy wood stove, and a BBQ grill, this retreat is ideal for family getaways or couples seeking a peaceful escape.

reviews.comment: I was highly disappointed with my stay. The cleanliness was terrible, and the pictures were misleading. The furniture was outdated, the bedding was uncomfortable, and there was a strange smell that lingered throughout the cabin. I was expecting a peaceful, relaxing vacation, but instead, I spent most of my time dealing with the inconveniences of the place. The water pressure was weak, making it difficult to shower, and there were plumbing issues. The remote location also meant that getting assistance was almost impossible. I reached out to the host multiple times, but communication was slow and unhelpful. This was not worth the money spent, and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

I was highly disappointed with my stay. The cleanliness was terrible, and the pictures were misleading. The furniture was outdated, the bedding was uncomfortable, and there was a strange smell that lingered throughout the cabin. I was expecting a peaceful, relaxing vacation, but instead, I spent most of my time dealing with the inconveniences of the place. The water pressure was weak, making it difficult to shower, and there were plumbing issues. The remote location also meant that getting assistance was almost impossible. I reached out to the host multiple times, but communication was slow and unhelpful. This was not worth the money spent, and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

Not worth the price. The location was remote and difficult to find, and the service was lacking. We had issues with the heating system, and the host wasn't available to assist. It felt like we were left on our own with no proper instructions or guidance on how to manage the place. The photos didn't reflect the reality of the cabin, which was quite rundown. We left earlier than planned because we couldn't enjoy the stay.

It felt like we were left on our own with no proper instructions or guidance on how to manage the place. The photos didn't reflect the reality of the cabin, which was quite rundown. We left earlier than planned because we couldn't enjoy the stay.

The amenities were below average, and the host wasn't very responsive to our concerns. The cabin lacked basic necessities like extra towels and kitchen supplies. Additionally, the Wi-Fi didn't work, which was a major inconvenience since we needed it for work. The cabin is in a beautiful location, but the lack of proper management made the stay uncomfortable. The place needs maintenance, and it was clear that it hadn't been cleaned properly before our arrival. I wouldn’t return unless some serious improvements were made.

While the surroundings were beautiful, the cabin itself needed maintenance. It was not clean enough, and some amenities were either broken or missing. The heater was malfunctioning during our stay, and we spent a couple of cold nights before it got fixed. The hot tub, which was one of the main reasons we chose this cabin, wasn't clean. It seemed like it hadn't been used in a while. We did manage to enjoy some parts of the trip, but overall, I can't recommend this place unless some improvements are made.

The location was picturesque, but the cabin wasn't as well-kept as expected. We faced several issues with cleanliness and the overall state of the cabin. The kitchen was poorly stocked, and the appliances were outdated. We found that some of the furniture was broken, and the bathroom needed some serious attention. The host was friendly, but there wasn't much they could do during our stay since it was peak season. We tried to make the best out of our vacation, but it didn’t meet our expectations.

The place was decent, but we faced a few issues during our stay. The view was amazing, and we enjoyed the serene environment. However, the cabin itself needed a bit more care. The bed was not comfortable, and the kitchen lacked some essential utensils. There were also a few maintenance issues, like a leaky faucet and poor heating. The host was responsive and did their best to fix things, but it affected our experience. It’s a nice spot, but the management could improve the overall experience for guests.

The cabin was comfortable enough, but it didn’t live up to the expectations set by the photos and description. It felt a bit outdated, and some areas were not as clean as they should have been. We also had an issue with the heating system, which took a while to be resolved. On the positive side, the surrounding nature was beautiful, and we enjoyed hiking in the area. I think with a little more effort from the host, this place could be great, but as it stands, it was just an average experience.

The cabin was okay, but not exceptional. The location was great for outdoor activities, but the interior of the cabin needed some updates. We found that the furniture was old, and the kitchen was poorly equipped. The cleanliness could have been better as well. However, the host was very responsive and friendly, which made our stay more pleasant. Overall, it wasn’t bad, but it could have been better.

The host was friendly and tried to help, but the experience fell short of what we were expecting.

The cabin provided us with a cozy and comfortable experience. The views of the surrounding mountains were breathtaking, and the location was ideal for anyone looking to get away from the hustle and bustle of city life. The place was clean and had all the basic amenities we needed. There were a few small issues, like the Wi-Fi connection being spotty at times and the heating taking a little while to kick in. However, these were minor inconveniences in an otherwise pleasant stay. We especially enjoyed the firepit outside, where we spent our evenings. I would recommend this place for a peaceful and scenic retreat.

The cabin was very comfortable and well-suited for our group of friends. We spent a lot of time exploring the nearby trails and loved the natural beauty surrounding the property. Inside, the cabin was clean and cozy, though the kitchen could use a few more utensils and supplies. The fireplace was a nice touch, and we enjoyed gathering around it in the evenings. The Wi-Fi was a bit slow, but it wasn’t a major issue for us since we were there to disconnect and enjoy nature. Overall, it was a great experience, and we would come back.

We had a wonderful time at the cabin. The location was beautiful, with stunning views of the mountains and a peaceful, quiet atmosphere. The cabin itself was clean and well-kept, though we did encounter a few minor issues, such as the heating system taking some time to warm up. The host was responsive and helpful, quickly addressing any concerns we had. One of the highlights of our trip was using the hot tub, which was perfectly situated to take in the views. Overall, a great experience that we would definitely recommend to others.

The cabin was a wonderful place to escape for the weekend. We loved the rustic feel of the place, and it had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The location was ideal for hiking and outdoor activities, and we were able to enjoy the beautiful scenery. The only downside was that the cabin could use a bit of updating, especially the kitchen appliances and the bathroom. But overall, we had a fantastic time and would consider coming back in the future.

We had a very pleasant stay at the cabin. The surroundings were stunning, and the cabin itself was well-furnished and cozy. The host was attentive and made sure that we had everything we needed. We spent a lot of time by the fireplace, which added to the cozy atmosphere. The kitchen was well-equipped, although we wished there were more pots and pans for cooking. The Wi-Fi wasn’t the best, but it didn’t matter too much because we spent most of our time outdoors. Overall, it was a great stay and we would definitely recommend it to others.
